title: Companion font for Meta
content:
Hi

Any suggestions of what serif to pair Meta with?

I'm setting meta as body and boxouts also straps and captions, however I want to use a serif for headers and pullquotes - for that emotional, traditional and authoritative connection.

The job is a high end tourist brochure.

I'm using Minion Pro at the moment and fairly happy with the results - just wondered if anyone had any other suggestions??

Thanks
author: dendicott

christ I am exctited I love Meta!

Muzz

Erik Spiekermann himself has used Minion with FF Meta to good effect, so you're not off the mark. I'd also recommend [FF Clifford](http://web.archive.org/web/20150407232423/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Clifford) which has a little more character than Minion and similar cuts specifically for text and headline sizes.

Also take a gander a Albertina which has a little more personality than Minion but its not as 'fabulous' as Clifford.

Mikey :-)
